ComicInfo.Summary: After hiding Adrenalynn from the Russians who made her, Yuri decides to put Addie into action against the remaining Russian monster androids! This means big bucks for Yuri, but at what cost when his new weapon is an innocent teenage killing machine? We also get further into Adrenalynn's past when she was just an orphaned handicapped girl living during the Cold War in Russia's most neglected children's orphanage. Mega monster-robot action vs. the teenage and superiorly-built Adrenalynn--will brute strength win out against agility and precision?? Find out when Addie battles Ciron, in the second issue of what's sure to be the sensation of the Summer!
